description: Minimalist landing page for CSCX.ai with Google OAuth authentication

userStories.title: Landing Page Component Structure
userStories.description: Create the base LandingPage component with proper structure
acceptanceCriteria: components/LandingPage.tsx exists with proper TypeScript types
Component receives onLogin callback prop (optional)
Uses useAuth hook from ../context/AuthContext for signInWithGoogle and isLoading
Page has three sections: header (landing-header), main (landing-main), footer (landing-footer)
Uses inline <style> tag for all CSS
Imports Inter font from Google Fonts
Build succeeds with no new TypeScript errors
userStories.notes: LandingPage.tsx already exists - review and verify it meets all criteria

userStories.title: Header with Logo
userStories.description: Display CSCX.ai branding in the header
acceptanceCriteria: Header displays 'CSCX' text followed by '.ai'
The period uses accent color #e63946 via .accent class
Logo uses font-weight 800, letter-spacing -0.03em
Header has padding: 2rem 4rem
Responsive: padding 1.5rem on mobile (max-width: 768px)

userStories.title: Hero Content Section
userStories.description: Display compelling hero content with value proposition
acceptanceCriteria: Label 'Customer Success Platform' in uppercase, accent color, letter-spacing 0.15em
Title: 'The future of' on first line, 'Customer Success.' on second line
'Customer Success' uses muted color #555555 via .muted class
Period at end uses accent color via .accent-dot class
Title uses font-size clamp(2.5rem, 8vw, 4.5rem), font-weight 800
Subtitle describes AI-powered workflows for onboarding and agents
Content centered with max-width 580px

userStories.title: Google Sign-In Button
userStories.description: Implement Google OAuth sign-in button with proper styling
acceptanceCriteria: Button displays Google multicolor SVG logo
Button text: 'Continue with Google' normally, 'Signing in...' when loading
Button calls signInWithGoogle() on click
Button disabled when isLoading is true
Button style: black background #000000, white text, no border
Hover: opacity 0.85, transform translateY(-2px)
Below button: 'By signing in, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy'
Terms and Privacy links use accent color
userStories.notes: Button uses signInWithGoogle from useAuth hook

userStories.title: Footer Section
userStories.description: Display footer with copyright and links
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays '© 2025 CSCX.ai — CAS Advisory'
Footer links: About, Contact, info@casadvisory.ca (mailto)
Footer has border-top: 1px solid #e5e5e5
Links use color #555555, hover to #000000
Responsive: flex-direction column, centered on mobile

userStories.title: App.tsx Integration
userStories.description: Show landing page when user is not authenticated
acceptanceCriteria: Import LandingPage component in App.tsx
Check authentication state using useAuth hook (user or session)
If no authenticated user, render LandingPage instead of main dashboard
After successful Google login, user sees main dashboard
No flash of dashboard before landing page shows (use isLoading state)
Build succeeds: npm run build exits with code 0
userStories.notes: App.tsx already uses useAuth. Check for user/session state to conditionally render.
